#summary How to compile python-tesseract for Mac Mountain Lion

=How to compile python-tesseract (for Mac Mountain Lion )=
{{{
launch xCode, then go to Preferences -> Downloads and install "Command Line Tools". 
Restart Terminal and you will be able to use Make.

Install MacPorts
wget https://distfiles.macports.org/MacPorts/MacPorts-2.1.2-10.8-MountainLion.pkg
 
wget http://www.leptonica.com/source/leptonica-1.69.tar.gz
tar zxvf leptonica-1.69.tar.gz
cd leptonica-1.69
./configure --prefix=/usr
make
sudo make install

wget http://downloads.sourceforge.net/project/opencvlibrary/opencv-unix/2.4.2/OpenCV-2.4.2.tar.bz2
tar jxvf OpenCV-2.4.2.tar.bz2
mkdir release
cd release
cmake -D CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELEASE -D CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr -D BUILD_PYTHON_SUPPORT=ON ..
make
sudo make install

svn checkout http://tesseract-ocr.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ tesseract-ocr
yum install libjpeg-devel libpng-devel libtiff-devel zlib-devel
yum install gcc gcc-c++ make
cd tesseract-ocr/
./autogen.sh
./configure --prefix=/usr
make
sudo make install

svn checkout http://python-tesseract.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ python-tesseract
cd python-tesseract
python setup.py build
python setup.py install


}}}
